display:
Basic screen display functionalities

Basic screen display functionalities
display.graph: Adds a new point to the trend chart and renders it to the screen.
display.graphClear: Clears the trend chart and the screen
display.showConsole: Sends the log messages to the brick screen and uses the brick up and down buttons to scroll.
display.showNumber: Shows a number on the screen
display.showNumber|param|line: the line number to print the text at (starting at 1), eg: 1
display.showString: Show text on the screen at a specific line.
display.showString|param|line: the line number to print the text at (starting at 1), eg: 1
display.showString|param|text: the text to print on the screen, eg: "Hello world"
display.showValue: Shows a name, value pair on the screen
display.showValue|param|line: the line number to print the text at (starting at 1), eg: 1
